experience: You and Vince both know Anastasia Gamick

DAS Group Professionals (DGP) is a distributed network infrastructure company staying ahead of mobile broadband and wireless demands. We design, build, monitor and maintain neutral-host distributed networks directly for venue owners.
At ForzaTelecom we provide turnkey solutions for telecom site development and operations management.
Director of Operations for the Pacific Northwest team of 70+ employees developing wireless communications in California, Washington, Oregon and Idaho.
recommendations: Irina was an invaluable member of our team and a trusted resource that would always deliver on her commitments. She is the epitome of a self-starter who will tackle new and challenging tasks with zeal.  Due to the high pace of the work we performed, I was constantly throwing Irina into roles that were both varied in scope and difficulty.  Additionally, the work regularly came with seemingly unrealistic deadlines and with high degrees of pressure for both thoroughness and accuracy.   Without fail, any time we internally quality controlled her deliverables or when our clients audited work, Irina’s work product consistently was beyond reproach.  In addition, Irina's ability to coordinate the efforts of her subordinates and her management of outside service providers was thorough and with consistent follow-through.  Overall, her skill sets allowed me to completely hand-off projects to her and I could trust they would be completed accurately, on time and the client would be thrilled with the outcome.

Attorney at California State Lands Commission

Sharron is one of the brightest and most talented people I’ve had the pleasure of working with and she has an amazing ability to work independently. She is able to accomplish assignments with an uncanny thoroughness and speed.  Sharron is a talented individual who has great depth of understanding of innovation and what it takes for organizations to create an environment that supports innovation. She is truly an amazing resource.

summary: I am on a constant mission to deliver the highest quality, most cost effective and timely product to my clients while persistently encouraging those on my team to do the same.
